name: Health is AMMO
description:
The Web Version Doesn't Work Currently... Kindly Wait

Controls:

  • W-A-S-D: Player Movement
  • Mouse: Aiming
  • Left Mouse Button: To Shoot

Health is AMMO is a 2D Abstract Shooter, and as the name suggests, Your health decreases as you shoot, so be careful how you shoot and survive the enemy waves.

There is a Health/Ammo Pickup which is spawned always on the map and an arrow points towards the same pickup.

This is my First Game and I really hope you like it.

Tools used to make the Game:

  • Unity 2D: Game Engine
  • Jetbrains Rider: IDE
  • PowerPoint 2016: Game Art
  • Ecrett Music: Background Music
  • SFXR Sound Generator: Sound Effects
